To install ZXTune to dingux

1) Extract this archive content to local/apps/zxtune folder
2) Edit local/dmenu/themes/${ThemeName}/menu_media.cfg:

include("/usr/local/apps/zxtune/menu.cfg")

in any place inside 'Menu' section (NOT inside 'MenuItem'!!!)

3) Edit zxtune.conf for best sound

Hotkeys (not configured yet):

Left/Right - seeking
Up/Down/Left shoulder/Right shoulder - change volume
Start/B - pause
Select - exit
Any other - search for the next chiptune
